welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Tadworth, a charming town nestled in the heart of the United Kingdom. Known for its scenic beauty and warm hospitality, we invite you to explore and experience all that Tadworth has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is a busy hub for both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the main terminal for international flights, with a variety of shops, restaurants, and amenities.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi for up to 90 minutes throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: One of the original terminals at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Oneworld airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and Iberia.

wifi.note: Free for the first 45 minutes, then a fee is required for longer use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome offers a variety of services for both private and commercial flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport houses all check-in, baggage claim, and security facilities.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at London City Airport provides exclusive services for private jet passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Farnborough Airport caters specifically to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at RAF Station Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
